CTF

Capture the Flag

I’m currently having a lot of fun playing with my teammates from H4TUM some CTFs. We will also host our own CTF this year.

Recommendations

If you want to learn what all this is about and tackle some challenges, I can “recommend” (at least I started with) PicoCTF. If you are at TUM, I can “recommend” (it is a lot of fun, but your life will definitely suffer) the practical course Binary Exploitation.

And if you’re more interested in cryptography, check out CryptoHack.

The goto page for ctfs is CTFTIME.

I make sure to participate each year in at least:

  • Cyber Security Challenge Germany

And from now on:

  • FlareOn

If you are interested into Security in general, the CCC and specifically their congress might be interesting to you.
